      • getFile

        @RequestMapping(value="/projects/{project_name}/files/**",
                method=GET)
public FileModel getFile(@PathVariable(value="project_name")
                                                                                                                java.lang.String project_name,
                                                                                                                @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                                                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> otherOptions,
                                                                                                                @RequestParam(value="view",required=false,defaultValue="meta")
                                                                                                                java.lang.String view,
                                                                                                                @RequestParam(value="include_children",required=false)
                                                                                                                java.lang.String includeChildren,
                                                                                                                javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                                                javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Gets a specific file in a specific project
        Parameters:
        project_name - the name of the project that has the file
        view - which type of file type to be returned i.e. 'raw' for a bytestream or 'meta' for just file meta data.
        request - object containing information about the request
        response - object to return the bytestream if chosen.
        Returns:
        file
